page.title: 08Interviews with old people
page.content: { Mr.Aaron Wilkinson}is a well known character and author of the book{The {History of South Kirkby.}Born in 1907 he has seen many changes.The main area for living and shopping was Carr Lane where pit houses had been built to accomodate the miners at the new pit.There were also seventeen shops The rest of Kirkby remained mainly rural until 1945.Mr.Wilkinson told of door to door salesmen such as the yeast man,the parafin man,the muffin man and the pot man.He said today was an easier time.The cane was used greatly in school for very minor misdemeanors.Today it is banned. { Mrs.Defty}was born in 1900 and lived in Kirkby nearly all her life.She was one of eight children and so had no money to train as a nurse.No one stayed to school dinners whereas today children have a hot meal at school.
